title: Drawing, "Project for a Cruet Frame", 1750–75
medium: Graphite, pen, brush, sepia, yellow and red-brown water colors
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Standing as upon a base.  The outlines of the glass bottles in broken lines. Left below accounting in graphite.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Project for a Cruet Frame", 1750–75. Graphite, pen, brush, sepia, yellow and red-brown water colors. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-3193.
